definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
It is hard to change one's essential nature (idiom). You can't change who you are./Can the leopard change his spots? (Jeremiah 13:23)
it is easier to change mountains and rivers than to alter one's character (idiom)/you can't change who you are/Can the leopard change his spots?
pinyin: jiang1 shan1 yi4 gai3 , ben3 xing4 nan2 yi2

sentences.english: Because of the nature of their depravity.
sentences.chinese: 是因为她们本性的堕落。

sentences.english: Offer the invisble room in your heart and mind.
sentences.chinese: 在你的内心和头脑中为本性提供一个空间。

sentences.english: Change of habit cannot alter Nature.
He was very faithful and honest.
sentences.chinese: 他的本性就是忠实，非常忠厚。

sentences.english: You can against your nature and make up some smile.
sentences.chinese: 你可以正面违逆自己的本性强挤出一些笑颜。
人的本性是善良的，有分寸的。

sentences.english: Because of the nature of impermanence within the clouds, the river suffered very much.
sentences.chinese: 云彩那变化无常的本性，可让小河受尽了苦头。

sentences.english: Then man abides his real nature.
sentences.chinese: 这样，人就能保持其真实本性。

sentences.english: Horse of the natural objects, the free ride on the fertile fields, the nature of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 马本自然之物，自由驰骋于沃野，本性法天。

sentences.english: This will help keep the invisible visible in your mind.
sentences.chinese: 这将帮助你在头脑中使本性变的有迹可循。

sentences.english: Aloneness is our nature. Loneliness is us running away from it.
sentences.chinese: 孤独是我们的本性，而寂寞是我们想要逃离的。

sentences.english: Substance is an ultimate category in traditional western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 本体是传统西方哲学中的一个根本性的范畴。

sentences.english: The dispute illuminates the primitive nature of our attitude to portraiture.
sentences.chinese: 这一争论阐释了我们对肖像画的态度的本性。

sentences.english: Decide today to assign more value to the invisible things of life.
sentences.chinese: 从今天去就下决心将更高的价值让与生活中的本性。

sentences.english: National People's Congress is now less true nature and a child-like innocence.
sentences.chinese: 现在的人大都少了真实的本性，和一份孩子样的纯真。

sentences.english: Still, he cannot change the active nature.
sentences.chinese: 但他还是改不了“好动的本性”。

definition: human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
character acquired through long habit/habits and properties
